. The town's name is spelled in many different ways, Yabello, Yavello, Iavello or Yebelo, and an alternative name is Obda, which is also the name of a nearby mountain. Yabelo is located at a latitude and longitude of 4°53′N 38°5′E and an elevation of 1857 meters above sea level.
Yabelo is a small town with two gas stations, telephone service, a post office and a commercial bank, as well as at least one primary and one secondary school.
